title: It Happened In A Cemetery | The Grave Talks Preview
description:
It all started on a dark night in a cemetery with friends. Rosy Page slammed on the brakes and jumped out of the car to care for a young man standing in front of her with a massive gash in his head. Fearing the worst was about to happen, she rushed toward him to provide care. Only to see the young, injured man disappear into thin air. This was the start of a life that would be filled with spirits seeking out Rosy to deliver messages for her well-being and others.

 In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

    • When a person is killed suddenly and tragically, how can they ever understand that they are dead and find peace?


    • Is it possible to haunt ourselves with our demons or even positive energy? 


    • How did Rosy discover that she was a medium in recent years? 


    • What did she learn about her abilities once she accepted them?


  • As a Grave Keeper, for $5 per month, you will get:
  • Access to every episode of our show, AD-FREE – MONTHS BEFORE THEY GO PUBLIC.
  • Access to every EXCLUSIVE PART 2 episode of our show for Grave Keeper Only!
  • Access to submit questions to upcoming guests of our show.
  • The “good feeling” knowing that you are keeping this show alive (It really does feel good!)
Listen to part two of this interview and get exclusive access to HUNDREDS of bonus episodes at http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks
